directions: Combine first 5 ingredients in a large bowl; add eggs and oil, stirring until dry ingredients are moistened. (Do not beat.) Stir in vanilla, pineapple, 1 cup pecans, and bananas.

Pour batter into three greased and floured 9-inch round cakepans. Bake at 350Â° for 25 to 30 minutes or until a wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pans on wire racks 10 minutes; remove from pans, and cool completely on wire racks.
Spread Cream Cheese Frosting between layers and on top and sides of cake; sprinkle 1/2 cup chopped pecans on top. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: 3 cups all-purpose flour $Click to see savings
3 large eggs, beaten $Click to see savings
1 cup vegetable oil $Click to see savings
1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract $Click to see savings
1 cup chopped pecans $Click to see savings
1/2 cup chopped pecans $Click to see savings
title: Hummingbird Cake
